name: Island Navigator
text: {2}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Island Navigator gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
art_prompt: Island Navigator, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, bold, vibrant, dynamic, a Polynesian cleric guiding creatures through a stormy island at dusk, in the style of Ukiyo-e and Abstract expressionism, by Katsushika Hokusai, Jackson Pollock, and Frida Kahlo.

name: Spirit Shield
text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1. 
 If you control three or more white creatures, creatures you control get an additional +0/+1.
art_prompt: Spirit Shield, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, diverse, resolute, on a somber battlefield, in the style of Art Nouveau, digital art, by Yoshitaka Amano

name: Volcano Acolyte
text:
Volcano Acolyte gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control.
Whenever your devotion to white is five or more, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you or a creature you control this turn, prevent 2 of that damage.
flavor: In the heart of the volcano, faith burns brightest.
art_prompt: Volcano Acolyte, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, fiery, spiritual, serene, an Asian monk meditating in the heart of a volcano, in the style of Romanticism and surrealism, by Hokusai and Salvador Dali.

name: God of the Sea
text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, God of the Sea isn't a creature.
{T}: Tap or untap target Merfolk, Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent.
Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
God of the Sea's power and toughness are each equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to blue.)
art_prompt: God of the Sea, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, majestic, dreamlike, God of the Sea manipulating sea creatures in a vast underwater landscape, in the style of Surrealism, Symbolism, and Romanticism, by Yayoi Kusama

name: Ocean Navigator
text: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
art_prompt: Ocean Navigator, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, adventurous, a young scout navigating a ship through a stormy sea, in the style of Romanticism and Impressionism, oil painting, by J.M.W. Turner and Katsushika Hokusai.

name: Tidal Knowledge
text: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: The ancient mariners of Zendikar read the tides and stars, guiding their ships through treacherous waters.
art_prompt: Tidal Knowledge, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, atmospheric, textured, a Kor mariner navigating through a stormy sea using a magical compass and the stars, in the style of Romanticism and Symbolism, by J.M.W. Turner or Gustave Moreau.

name: Spirit of the Sea
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

{1}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: As elusive and vast as the sea itself, it navigates the waters with an ease that is almost unsettling.
art_prompt: Spirit of the Sea, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, glowing, navigating through the dark ocean, in the style of surrealism and impressionism with a touch of hyperrealism, digital painting, by James Gurney

name: Polynesian Deity
text: {2}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {4}{U}, {T}: Create a 6/6 blue Serpent creature token with 'Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may return it to its owner's hand.'
flavor: With a wave of its hand, the god of the sea sweeps away all opposition.
art_prompt: Polynesian Deity, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, vibrant, dynamic, a Polynesian deity summoning a sea serpent from a stormy ocean, in the style of Polynesian art and Baroque, by Kehinde Wiley

name: Shadowed Navigator
text: {2}{B}: Shadowed Navigator gains 'This creature can't be blocked' until end of turn.
art_prompt: Shadowed Navigator, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, mysterious, shadowy, ethereal, a cloaked figure emerging from the shadows on a foggy pirate ship deck, in the style of Gothic Surrealism, opaque medium, by Tim Burton

name: Spirit's Call
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
art_prompt: Spirit's Call, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, dreamlike, luminous, a serene spirit returning a creature from the graveyard in a dark, misty setting, in the style of Gothic Surrealism, by Zdzisław Beksiński

name: Dark Sacrifice
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Dark Sacrifice deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
art_prompt: Dark Sacrifice, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, gothic, dark fantasy, surreal, a shadowy figure performing a ritualistic sacrifice on a spectral creature at an ancient altar, in the style of Zdzisław Beksiński, opaque, dark, ethereal, textured medium, by H.R. Giger.

name: Kana, Goddess of the Underworld
text: Whenever a creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor: In the realm of the dead, Kana reigns supreme, feeding on the life force of her enemies to empower her followers.
art_prompt: Kana, Goddess of the Underworld, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, spectral, ethereal, luminescent, Kana drawing life force from a fallen creature in a dark, eerie underworld, in the style of Gothic, Surrealism, Dark Fantasy, by Yoshitaka Amano

name: Volcanic Eruption
text: Volcanic Eruption deals 2 damage to any target. If a land entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Volcanic Eruption deals 4 damage to any target instead.
art_prompt: Volcanic Eruption, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, fiery, mage commanding a massive volcanic eruption, in the style of realism mixed with art deco and a touch of romanticism, oil painting, by J.M.W. Turner and Georgia O'Keeffe, with a nod to Zdzisław Beksiński.

name: Fire Dancer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, Fire Dancer gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (This effect doesn't stack.)
art_prompt: Fire Dancer, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, vibrant, fiery, dynamic, a woman calling forth a spiral of flame on a darkened stage, in the style of Expressionism, bold colors and abstract forms, by Georgia O'Keeffe.

name: Spirit of the Volcano
text: When Spirit of the Volcano enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, Spirit of the Volcano deals 1 damage to any target. Evoke {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
art_prompt: Spirit of the Volcano, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, fiery, ethereal, destructive, erupting from a volcano in a stormy, volcanic landscape, in the style of Surrealism, Expressionism, and Romanticism, oil painting, by James Gleeson

name: Ancestral Fire God
text:
Ancestral Fire God's power and toughness are each equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to red.)
{2}{R}, {T}: Ancestral Fire God deals damage equal to your devotion to red to each creature your opponents control.
flavor: In the heart of the volcano, the fire god stirs, bringing both destruction and renewal.
art_prompt: Ancestral Fire God, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, fiery, intense, primal, the Fire God stirring from its slumber in the heart of a volcano, in the style of Surrealism, Abstract Expressionism, and Romanticism, oil painting or digital art, by Zdzisław Beksiński.

name: Jungle Explorer
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Explorer. If that land is a Forest, Jungle Explorer gains trample until end of turn.
art_prompt: Jungle Explorer, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dynamic, vibrant, detailed, a daring scout leaping over a jungle obstacle, in the style of Romanticism and Art Nouveau, by Thomas Moran

name: Verdant Blessing
text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
art_prompt: Verdant Blessing, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, transformative, serene, earthy, a druid summoning a lush land from a barren one, in the style of Romanticism and Art Nouveau with a touch of Ukiyo-e, oil painting or digital painting, by Emily Carr or Alphonse Mucha.

name: Spirit of the Canopy
text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. {G}, Sacrifice Spirit of the Canopy: Draw a card.
flavor: The spirit of the jungle stands tall, drawing strength from the vastness of the land.
art_prompt: Spirit of the Canopy, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, luminous, organic, a towering spirit entity made of vibrant green energy and plant life offering an orb of light in the heart of a dense jungle, in the style of magical realism and Art Nouveau, by Gustav Klimt and Georgia O'Keeffe.

name: Volcano God's Emissary
text: Whenever Volcano God's Emissary deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a colorless artifact token named 'Volcanic Soil' with 'Tap: Add one mana of any color.'
art_prompt: Volcano God's Emissary, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, fiery, surreal, a towering elemental shaman causing a volcanic eruption, in the style of Surrealism and Romanticism, oil painting, by Zdzisław Beksiński

name: Navigational Compass
text: {1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: The compass points the way, not to a destination, but to understanding.
art_prompt: Navigational Compass, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, detailed, vibrant, ethereal, an ancient compass floating in a mysterious library, in the style of surrealism, by Zdzisław Beksiński

name: Volcanic Rock
text:
{T}: Add {1}.
{T}, Sacrifice Volcanic Rock: Add {R}{R}{R}. Volcanic Rock deals 1 damage to you.
flavor: The volatile power of the volcano lies dormant, waiting to be unleashed.
art_prompt: Volcanic Rock, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, dramatic, fiery, a glowing volcanic rock cracking open in a desolate landscape, in the style of Romantic Realism, oils or acrylics, by J.M.W. Turner.

name: Spirit Totem
text: As Spirit Totem enters the battlefield, choose a color. As long as Spirit Totem is on the battlefield, add one to your devotion to the chosen color. (Each {color} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to {color}).
art_prompt: Spirit Totem, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, ethereal, luminous, vibrant, a mystical totem emanating a powerful aura in a magical forest, in the style of surrealism and fantasy art, by Yayoi Kusama

name: The Great Canoe
text:
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Whenever The Great Canoe attacks, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put that card onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
art_prompt: The Great Canoe, Magic the Gathering art, spec art, bold, vibrant, textured, a diverse group of creatures crewing a magical canoe on a mystical river at twilight, in the style of Post-Impressionism and Fauvism, by Paul Gauguin, Emily Carr, and Thomas Hart Benton.
